body: This has got to be one of the most bautiful Kawoshin ones out there. Not particularly filled with love, admittedly, but the sensualness & the subtleties are just fuccinnnnn beautiful to look at, you really feel the arousal between the two and with the heartwarming intimacy and love they already share, it's all the more impactful, it's lovely~<3 Great work right there, takes skill to know how to make that stick out so nicely.
I wish I had something this romantic
Ah this is the perfect balance of lewd and heartwarming. So well made
